00053 // create new sequence from scratch
00054 //-------------------------------
00055 FC_ReturnCode fc_createSequence(FC_Dataset dataset, char *seqname, 
00056                     FC_Sequence *sequence);

00058                           FC_DataType datatype, void* coords);

00060                           FC_DataType datatype, void* coords_p);

00064 //-------------------------------

00066                           char* newSeqName, FC_Sequence* new_seq);

00068                           dataset, double shift, double scale,
00069                           char* newSeqName, 
00070                           FC_Sequence* newseq);

00072                  int numStep, double offset, double stepsize,
00073                  char* seq_name, FC_Sequence *seq);
00074 FC_ReturnCode fc_createIntersectingRegularSequence(
00075                   int numseqs, FC_Sequence* seqs,
00076                   int numStep,
00077                   char* seqName,
00078                   FC_Sequence *sequence);

00080                   int numseqs, FC_Sequence* seqs,
00081                   double seqmin, double seqmax,
00082                   char* seqName,
00083                   FC_Sequence *sequence);

00088                      FC_Sequence **sequences);

00090 FC_ReturnCode fc_getSequenceByName(FC_Dataset dataset, char *seqName, 
00091                        int *numSequences,
00092                        FC_Sequence **sequences);

00097

00099 //-------------------------------
